actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail in Arizona and New Mexico, and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona and New Mexico, for study to determine the feasibility and desirability of their designation as National Historic Trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona and New Mexico as study areas to determine the feasibility of their designation as national historic trails.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail in Arizona and New Mexico, and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona and New Mexico, for study to determine the feasibility and desirability of their designation as National Historic Trails.
